Marie Chalhoub Office, Jebel Ali Free Zone, Dubai, UAE
*	Issue: Water damage to flooring due to rainfall and leakage
*	Incidents: 3 separate occasions
*	Timeframe: February 12, 2024 - April 16, 2024

 

Incident details:

1.	February 12, 2024: Rainfall damaged installed flooring

Quotation: FM/3D/10518 R0/2024

2.	March 9, 2024: Rainfall damaged the incomplete installed flooring (approximately half of the room was completed)

Quotation: FM/3D/10539/2024

3.	April 16, 2024: Heavy rainfall caused significant damage across the entire room

Quotation: FM/3D/10582/2024

 

We acknowledge the delay in submitting this claim, which was caused by internal miscommunication. We are actively addressing this issue.

 

Furthermore, despite remedial actions taken after each incident, including the application of a moisture barrier, we continued to experience water damage. A comprehensive preventative plan is now in place to avoid future incidents.

 

Please note that the repair works for all three incidents have been completed.

 

Attached, please find:

 

*	Site Report from Floor Master LLC with includes Quotations and Tax Invoices for all three incidents & photographs documenting the damage
*	Relevant insurance policy for easy reference

 

If a surveyor needs to be appointed, they can coordinate with our Project Manager:

 

*	Name:                Mr. Sooraj Kannu
*	Contact:             052 929 4540

 

We're ready to provide any additional information or documentation you may require to process this claim.

 

Your assistance with this claim is much appreciated. I await your guidance on how to proceed and, as always, thank you for your continued support.
